member.summary: Creates a Dictionary that stores values containing embedded keys.
member.typeparam: The type of keys in the collection.
The type of items in the collection.
member.param: The items to populate the dictionary with.
A delegate that extracts the embedded key from each item.

The number of elements the collection can hold without creating a lookup dictionary. (0 creates the lookup dictionary when the first item is added), or –1 to specify that a lookup dictionary is never created.
